title: Title
allMonths: Jan Feb Mar Apr May Jun Jul Aug Sep Oct Nov Dec
group-create-subtitle: Collaborate closely with a group of people to share responsibilities and increase rewards.
createAccountDesc: Create an account to enjoy all of our cool features
termsAndConditions: By joining, I agree to terms and conditions
group-invite-description: Invite people to join your group by sharing with them the code below.
pageNotFoundDescr: Sorry, the page you requested could not be found. Please go back to homepage.
landingPageDesc: Assign tasks efficiently and organise your chores so work is spread equally amongst family members.
presItemTitle1: Organise the work that needs to be done into different tasks
presItemTitle2: Set a deadline for the tasks created, so that they can be prioritised
presItemTitle3: You have the ability to create private groups for assigning task
presItemTitle4: You have the option to invite friends into various groups
presItemDesc1: You can write tasks so that work that needs to be done can be broken down in smaller tasks, for a more efficient completion
presItemDesc2: Deadlines can also be set when creating various tasks, so that users know which tasks can be postponed, and to also know how to manage their time
presItemDesc3: You can create private groups, and thus becoming the owner, so that you can separate various environments in which you need to manage multipme people with multiple tasks
presItemDesc4: After you have created a group, you have the ability to invite friends into your group, streamlining the process of creating teams
discussTaskDesc: You can discuss with other members through comments left for a task.
prioritizeDesc: It's essentially to know the priority of a task, to know what to do next.
setDueDateDesc: With the due date feature, you will always progress with your task.
